title: Time Freeze
body: So basically my game is normal until later in the game for no reason everything stops in time then resumes and its like lag, but my ping and ms is fine anyone have solution?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some connection issues like packet loss, which can show up as this kind of input delay.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Time will be restored!  :D
